de.jackwhite20.cyclone.db.serialization

Class SerializationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jackwhite20.cyclone.db.serialization.SerializationManager

  • public class SerializationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by JackWhite20 on 11.10.2015. Represents a class that can be used to serialize classes to eg. tables etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializationManager(Cyclone cyclone)
      Creates a new instance from SerializationManager with the cyclone instance.

      • select

        public <T> java.util.List<T> select(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                    int limit,
                                    Order order,
                                    Condition... conditions)
        Selects data from the table given in the template class, the limit, the sort order and conditions. The template class need the Table annotation and fields need the Column annotation.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the template class.
        limit - the limit. -1 if no limit is needed.
        order - the sort order.
        conditions - the conditions for the SQL SELECT.
        Returns:
        a automatically filled list of the template class type with field set.

        Parameters:

                      Condition... conditions)
        Deletes rows from the SQL table given in the template class and the conditions. The template class need the Table annotation.

        conditions - the conditions.
        Returns:
        true if ot was successful otherwise false.

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.Object object,
                      java.lang.String[] setColumns,
                      Condition... conditions)
        Updates an SQL table and sets the columns in the setColumns array to the values from the field in the template class where the primary key from the template class matches. The template class need the Table annotation and fields need the Column annotation.
        Parameters:
        object - the template class as an object.
        setColumns - the columns that should be updated.
        conditions - the extra conditions.
        Returns:
        true if ot was successful otherwise false.

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.Object object,
                      Condition... conditions)
        Updates all columns from an SQL table where the extra conditions matches. The template class need the Table annotation and fields need the Column annotation.
        Parameters:
        object - the template class as object.
        conditions - the conditions.
        Returns:
        true if ot was successful otherwise false.
